1.content:
Here you are, mind still mostly stuck in the 90's, and your love for cartoons has reached a brand new area of obsession. Your life seemed to be at a dead end, until one day, you come across an ad in the paper, looking for volunteers for a new television experiment. Excitement rushes through you as you instantly apply for it.


A few days later, you get a call from the company, telling you that you need to come down as quickly as possible. When you arrive, they put you in a small room, with a TV, remote, and a chair. The scientist there gives you simple instructions: Pick a TV show. Any show, and watch it through.

So you pick a channel, and immediately feel something was off. You look back to find that the scientist had left the room, and the TV had started glowing. With a bright flash, you find yourself no longer in the small room, but instead flying through what appears to be a warp hole. You black out before landing, with a thud, on the ground.


You open your eyes after a while, rubbing your head.

Which show did you watch?

1553322.content: How about We Bare Bears?
1553322.title: Keep on goin'

15533221.content:
You wake up groggily, your head pounding and heart beating fast. Even so you tried to steady yourself and take a look at your surroundings.

It looks like... a kitchen? It was oddly small and didn't have much in it, other than the bare necessities. Though, who are you to complain about things being oddly small, because you were also shrunken. You decide that if their is anyone living in this house, they'll be able to help you. As you stood up and took on your way, you were halted as a large shadow engulfed your view.

Straining your eyes, you could see that the figure was...
15533221.title: If you can't handle the heat...

choices: Grab on to the paw and climb
155332211.content:
As your eyes adjusted to the view, you realized what you were seeing. It was a grizzly bear on two feet walking right towards you. You thought that the kitchen looked familiar, but you didn't realize that you'd be meeting characters from We Bare Bears.
Though, your excitement soon became fear as you noticed that Grizz's paw was lifted right over your head. You could smell the horrible stench emanating from the foot and from Grizz's entire body. You remember that he was the one that took the least care of himself, hygiene wise. This odor threw you off balance as you tried to run away. Grizz's smelly paw slammed down only a few feet away from you.

You are knocked on your back. You look and see Grizz, although you couldn't see his face well because his fat gut was in the way, completely distracted on his phone.
As his paw begins to lift up, you decide to...
155332211.title: A giant grizzly bear!

choices: Climb further up to escape the smell
Stay and wait for him to stop
1553322111.content:
Biting your lip you watch as the paw slowly began to move forward, knowing that you were running out of time, you sped after the bear, only stopping momentarily as you leaped. Propelling forward, you closed your eyes and grabbed onto the first things your hands touched. Your mind was fuzzy, but it was nothing compared to Grizz's fur. You began to pull yourself forward and as you head settled, you finally realized why you may have hesitated with this. Your hear was spinning with how dreadful the smell was, the rich vinegary scent mixed with the usual cheesy scent of feet created a miasma of putrid musk. You never knew feet could get this bad and was made this worse was you trying your hardest not to fall off and roll under the foot, you had to pull yourself from the ankle to the front, which was, unfortunately, closer to the ursine's meaty and rank toes.

Holding your breath was not an option as soon you'd take a deep one and almost knock yourself out, as the smell was so much greater with you at this size.
1553322111.title: Smelly Ride

155332212.content: Well? Which one is it?
155332212.title: Panda/Ice Bear

choices: You're able to get him to notice you
1553322121.content:
Okay, this is good. You figured out where you were and what your plan of action was. But there was one thing that you still don't know. Where are you currently standing?

You didn't have time to examine the area before your only source of light was blocked by a humongous shadow. It was difficult to see what the figure was but you could tell that it was the big butt of an even bigger panda bear. The panda's rear fur was black with small brown spots of dirt and you-know-what. It was just then that you made a sudden (though now obvious) realization.

"OH, I'm standing on a giant cha-"WHAM!!

The massive panda's rear pressed against your entire body, landing you on your back with your hands gripping the panda's ass in a futile attempt to push it way. Thankfully, the panda's flesh is soft, plump and squishy. You breath a sigh of relief when you realize that the pressure placed on you by the overwhelmingly fat panda didn't hurt all that much. The mixture of the panda's sweat and a more bitter smell that you could only imagine was coming from his "tail end" created an odor that stung your eyes. During the suffering, you hear the panda speak. After getting over the initial shock of hearing a panda bear speak, you realize that you recognize the voice.

This wasn't just any panda bear, This was Panda from We Bare Bears!!
Now you knew that you had to get his attention. Pan-Pan was the most fragile and understanding of the three bears. But how could you possibly do that if he never notices that you're trapped under his smelly rump.

Breathing in his fumes, you pray the Panda notices you before it's too late.
1553322121.title: Unfortunate and unaware

15533221211.content:
You had tried everything to get Panda to notice you. Punches,slaps,LICKS,all aimed toward his butt did nothing. You had given up completely at this point, your only plan was to just wait until he sat up again and try to get his attention from there. You knew that the plan probably won't work but...

Suddenly, Panda's movements had interrupted your thoughts. He wasn't getting up, but shifting around in his seat for some reason. You,of course, were being jostled around with each of Panda's movements. When Panda stopped moving, you found yourself flooded by the light of the kitchen. Your head and shoulders were freed but everything from the waist down was still stuck. Your excitement of almost being out from under Panda's massive backside was replaced with fear whan your eyes adjusted to the light.

You had shifted right in front of Panda's tail and butthole and he looks like he's getting ready to push something out. The farts were small but there were so many and they all smelled terrible. Each of the rancid farts made you cough and gag harder than you ever had before.

After what felt like hours, the farts had stopped and while you were relieved you were still coughing. But amazingly, your loud coughing had caught Panda's attention. He looked around himself, tracking the sound, and eventually looked down at you.

The pressure of Panda's massive rear had been lifted off of you, but was immediately replaced by the pressure of being squeezed between two of Panda's fingers. As he lifted you up, you caught a brief glimpse at Ice Bear but he was completely distracted doing something else. Panda sniffed you, pulling your entire body towards his big black nose. When he opened his mouth to talk to you, you noticed his foul smelling breath and poor hygiene.

"Are you okay? I'm gonna take you back to my room now, cool?"
You nodded a yes in response to both of these questions. You could tell Panda felt bad for what he did by the way he talked to you.
Talking to himself, Panda muttered "I'm gonna need to put you somewhere so nobody notices you, though"
Panda's eyes immediately brighten and he decides to put you...
15533221211.title: You're able to get him to notice you

15533221212.content:
After being trapped underneath Panda for a while, you begin to lose hope of getting him to notice you. Panda was completely content in eating his meal while you were cemented to his moderately sized behind. Every time he shuffles in his seat, you body is ground against his fur and flesh and you are forced to taste his sweat.

The constant pressure from Panda's weight was beginning to be too much for you Just when you thought you were done for, Panda began to move upwards.
"He's getting up," you thought to yourself, "maybe I can get his attention from the chair before he leaves!"
This is your last chance, and if you don't succeed then...wait.

You start to think that your plan might not work when you find yourself being lifted of the chair with Panda. Apparently, the combination of the pressure and sweat has matted you to Panda's fur. Even when the massive panda bear starts walking, you can't get loose and stuck breathing down his horrendous fumes.

After a while, Panda stops and lets loose a fart on your small form. Your eyes begin to water and when you open them again, you notice that you are in Panda's
15533221212.title: Extra Cargo

choices: Ice Bear decides to taste you first
1553322122.content:
If someone told you when you woke up this morning that you would be standing in front of a giant version of one of your favorite cartoon characters, then you would probably call the police. But, as much as you couldn't believe, a giant Ice Bear was looming over you. He hadn't seen you yet, so you thought to escape quickly because you know how unpredictable Ice Bear can be.

You lifted yourself to your feet and tried to run away before slipping and falling painfully on your back. You kicked your legs as you saw that you were sliding towards the edge of the surface you were on. You managed to stop yourself right before going over the edge and took a second to look at yourself surroundings.
First, you looked down and saw the hard floor of the kitchen, then caught a glimpse of Ice Bear's paws. You must be on the counter of the kitchen. Your eyes followed Ice Bear's leg up to his rounded gut and up to his eyes.

You took a large gulp as you realized that his eyes were looking right at you. Before you could even think about running away, Ice Bear snatched you and brought you to his face. You were standing on top of his padded paw and were too stunned to even say anything. Ice Bear didn't say anything either but he clearly didn't see you as anything more than food, judging by his look.

Suddenly, Ice Bear's fingers curled over you and your world was plunged into darkness. When he uncurled his fingers, you were falling towards Ice Bear's open maw at an incredible speed.
You dropped passed the giant polar bear's lips and dirty teeth and landed on his soft and wet tongue. Ice Bear closed his mouth and you were laft in the odorous cave with peices of mashed food left on Ice Bear's tongue.

As soon as you tried to move on the wet surface of Ice Bear's tongue, it starts to move.
1553322122.title: Ice Bear

info.brief_description: After seeing enough stories about women only, it's time for some MEN!
info.description:
In this story, we have our main character, who will simply be known as "You".


Your character will be put in several intersting, adult situations with a choice of male cartoon characters, both furry and not.

The character must ALWAYS be male. (I will delete anything involving female characters.)


Vore, Growth, Shrinking, and LOTS of Explicitness will be involved.


Enjoy!



P.S. If you like what you see here, ADD TO IT. The more people add to the story, the more I have to work off of and make this story flourish.
